attributes.additional_details: one man is killed every 12 days by a partner or loved one the police say report it we care we will prosecute the defendent. but if a man reports it to the police their treated with such content and like there diserved it even the cps and attorney generals office ignore this crime. i am a victim and have not had JUSTICE TODATE. i have been let down by the law and no department cares help raise this isshue sign this e-petition be hurd.
